articles.title: "You Can't Be Asking...": Sunil Gavaskar's Blunt Response To Rohit Sharma On '3-Match WTC Final' Dem.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India lost against Australia by 209 runs in the WTC final at The Oval on Sunday after they were bundled out for 234, in the chase of 444.
articles.content: After Australia skipper Pat Cummins disagreed with Rohit Sharma's desire to play a three-match series in the next cycle of the World Test Championship final, batting legend Sunil Gavaskar has also cr… [+1699 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Nathan Lyon wins 'equivalent of a World Cup' in WTC Final - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia veteran Nathan Lyon watched on as teammates lifted two World Cup trophies over the past decade but finally tasted glory on a global stage in the ICC World Test Championship Final.
articles.content:
Australia veteran Nathan Lyon watched on as teammates lifted two World Cup trophies over the past decade but finally tasted glory on a global stage in the ICC World Test Championship Final.
